title: Occult - Grimoires Vol 1 (pdf) EarthBow
description:
The word "Grimoire" comes from the same root as the word "Grammar." While Grammar gives us the rules we use to put words together in the right order, a Grimoire shows us the correct way to use magickal words and symbols. These works are the mainstay of ceremonial or ritual magick.

The 6th and 7th books of Moses might be the oldest, since legend claims they were given to Moses thousands of years ago. Until now, there were no good copies of these short works available. The ones I've seen are all but unreadable... the tables and seals too poorly reproduced to be of any value. The copies in this torrent correct that problem.

Barrett's Magus is perhaps the rarest and most influential grimoire available. Many forms of ceremonial magick cite this classic 2 volume work, including the Golden Dawn. It's an excellent reference for students of alchemy, astrology, the kabbalah, and magick in general.

Likewise, The Sacred Book Of Abramelin The Mage, The Lesser Key of Solomon, and the other works included here were chosen because they are the most respected and influential works of their type. These are intended as serious tools for the use of practicing occultists. As such, they are the highest quality, usable books, not mere library filler.


This torrent includes...             (all .pdf format)

Scheibel, Johan - The Sixth Book of Moses, 1848, 18 pages

Scheibel, Johan - The Seventh Book of Moses, 1849, 16 pages

Mathers, MacGregor - The Sacred Book Of Abramelin The Mage, translated in 1897, 251 pages

Barrett, Francis - The Magus Vol 1, 1801, 158 pages

Barrett, Francis - The Magus Vol 2, 1801, 129 pages

Turner, Robert - Arbetel of Magick, translated in 1655, 36 pages

Mathers, MacGregor - The Greater Key of Solomon Vol 1, 1916 edition, 60 pages

Mathers, MacGregor - The Greater Key of Solomon Vol 2, 1916 edition, 48 pages

Mathers, MacGregor - The Greater Key of Solomon, Pentacles, 1916 edition,

Mathers, MacGregor - The Lesser Key of Solomon, Lemegeton Vol 1 (Goetia), 1903, 50 pages

Mathers, MacGregor - The Lesser Key of Solomon, Lemegeton Vol 2 (Theurgia Goetia), 1903, 54 pages

Mathers, MacGregor - The Lesser Key of Solomon, Lemegeton Vol 3 (The Pauline Art), 1903, 23 pages

Mathers, MacGregor - The Lesser Key of Solomon, Lemegeton Vol 4 (Ars Almadel), 1903, 9 pages

Mathers, MacGregor - The Lesser Key of Solomon, Lemegeton Vol 5 (Ars Nova), 1903, 8 pages


Note: I will be adding many more titles soon, Search for "EarthBow" for a list of available titles.

As always, comments (good or bad) are appreciated

Keywords: occult, esoteric, grimoire, magick, magik, witchcraft, spellbook, spell book, text
